#summary How to construct a new Client instance

In order to construct a new Client instance, you need to provide:

  * the URL of your SCEP server
  * an [http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/security/cert/X509Certificate.html X509Certificate]
  * a [http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/security/PrivateKey.html PrivateKey]
  * a [http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/security/auth/callback/CallbackHandler.html CallbackHandler]
